pullRequest.title: add build script in test repository, update setup script
pullRequest.bodyText:
Specifying the build process in Bamboo is inflexible: one needs to use the online UI and change it both for the template as well as the solution build plan.
In our course, we want to adapt and extend the build process easily according to our needs for certain exercises. For example, we regularly offer special competition exercises where we need to run additional benchmarks or simulations that cannot readily be covered by one standard build process.
Description


I changed the default build process to simply execute a file called run.sh that will be shipped with the test repository.
I added a default run.sh file that covers most standard use cases.
I update the setup script to also create an assignment folder so that the build works out of the box on a local machine without having to manually create such a folder first.

commit.message: feat(haskell) add build script in test repository, update setup script
fix(haskell) add multiline backslash for consistency
